com.k2.Util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility provides static method for handling String values.
    Author:
    simon

      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object v)
      This method converts the given object into a String value Static utility methods convert Strings, Integers, Longs, Floats, Doubles, Dates and Booleans into String values If the given object is not one of the above types then a type converter must have been registered with this static utility in order for the given object to be converted into a String value If no type converter has been registered for the class of the given object then a null is returned
      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String v)
      This method converts the given string into a String value

      • registerTypeConverter

        public static void registerTypeConverter(TypeConverter<?,java.lang.String> converter)
        This method registers with this static utility an instance of a String TypeConverter to convert an instance of the convertible class into a String value
        Parameters:
        converter - The String TypeConverter instance

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object v)
        This method converts the given object into a String value Static utility methods convert Strings, Integers, Longs, Floats, Doubles, Dates and Booleans into String values If the given object is not one of the above types then a type converter must have been registered with this static utility in order for the given object to be converted into a String value If no type converter has been registered for the class of the given object then a null is returned
        Parameters:
        v - The object to convert into a String value
        Returns:
        The String representation of the given object or null if the given object is null or the class of the given object cannot be converted into a String value

        Returns:

      • words

        public static java.lang.String[] words(java.lang.String value)

        Returns:
        An array of words

      • safeWord

        public static java.lang.String safeWord(java.lang.String word)
        This method ensures that only safe characters exist in the word. If the word only contains unsafe characters then an 6 character random string is returned
        Parameters:
        word - The word to make safe
        Returns:
        The word with unsafe characters removed

      • verySafeWord

        public static java.lang.String verySafeWord(java.lang.String word)
        This method ensures that only safe characters exist in the word. If the word only contains unsafe characters then an 6 character random string is returned
        Parameters:
        word - The word to make safe
        Returns:
        The word with unsafe characters removed

      • aliasCase

        public static java.lang.String aliasCase(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a String into alias case. Alias case has a lower case initial character for the first word and an upper case initial character for all subsequent words and no spaces
        Parameters:
        value - The string to convert to alias case
        Returns:
        The string in alias case

      • camelCase

        public static java.lang.String camelCase(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a String to camel case Camel case has an upper case initial character for each word in the input string and separates the words with a single white space
        Parameters:
        value - The String to convert to Camel case
        Returns:
        The String in Camel case

      • classCase

        public static java.lang.String classCase(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a string to class case. Class case has an upper case initial character for each word and no spaces
        Parameters:
        value - The string to convert to class case
        Returns:
        The string in class case

      • staticCase

        public static java.lang.String staticCase(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a string to static case Static case is all in upper case with words separated by a single underscore '_'
        Parameters:
        value - The string to convert to static case
        Returns:
        The string in static case

      • kebabCase

        public static java.lang.String kebabCase(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a string to kebab case Kebab case is all in lower case with words separated by a hyphen '-'
        Parameters:
        value - The string to convert to kebab case
        Returns:
        The string in kebab case

      • nvl

        public static java.lang.String nvl(java.lang.String checkValue,
                                   java.lang.String valueIfNull)
        This method converts null values
        Parameters:
        checkValue - The value to check for null
        valueIfNull - The value to return if the value to check is null
        Returns:
        The checkValue if it is not null else the valueIfNull

      • replaceAll

        public static java.lang.String replaceAll(java.lang.String input,
                                          java.lang.String match,
                                          java.lang.Object... replacements)
        This method replaces each occurrence of the match string with the replacements in the given order.
        Parameters:
        input - The string in which to replace the match strings
        match - The string to match
        replacements - An array of objects with which to replace the match strings
        Returns:
        The input string with the match strings replaces with the string variant of the given replacement using StringUtil.toString(Object)

      • concatenate

        public static java.lang.String concatenate(java.lang.String join,
                                           java.lang.Object... clauses)
        This method concatenates the given clauses separated by the given join. Note the join is only included in the output between each clause.
        Parameters:
        join - The string to join the clauses together
        clauses - An array of object clauses to concatenate together
        Returns:
        The clauses concatenated together with the join string between each clause

      • braceConcatenate

        public static java.lang.String braceConcatenate(java.lang.String open,
                                                java.lang.String join,
                                                java.lang.String close,
                                                java.lang.Object... clauses)
        This method concatenates the given clauses separated by the given join string, prefixed with the given open string and post fixed with close string
        Parameters:
        open - The opening string e.g '{'
        join - The joining string e.g. ', '
        close - The closing string e.g. '}'
        clauses - The objects to concatenate together using the result of StingUtil.toString(Object) to convert to a String
        Returns:
        The resultant concatenation

      • lastChar

        public static java.lang.String lastChar(java.lang.String string)
        This method returns the last character of a string
        Parameters:
        string - The string to test
        Returns:
        The last character of the string

      • plural

        public static java.lang.String plural(java.lang.String singular)
        This method returns the plural of the given singular string
        Parameters:
        singular - The singular name for which the plural variant is required
        Returns:
        The plural variant of the singular string or the singular string if it already ends with 'es'

      • splitCamelCase

        public static java.lang.String splitCamelCase(java.lang.String camelCase)
        This method splits the given camel case string into words
        Parameters:
        camelCase - A string in camel case
        Returns:
        The given camel case string as separate words

      • stringToIndex

        public static int stringToIndex(java.lang.String index)
        This static method converts the given string into an index value in a base26 manner with a - z having values 0 - 25 respectively Non alpha numeric values are stripped from the string and it is converted to lower case
        Parameters:
        index - The string to convert to an index value
        Returns:
        The integer value of the given base26 string

      • indexToString

        public static java.lang.String indexToString(int i)
        This static method converts the given integer value in to a base26 string with a - z having values 0 - 25 respectively
        Parameters:
        i - The integer value to convert
        Returns:
        The resultant base26 string
